name: Claude (Anthropic)
description: Developed by Anthropic, Claude is a sophisticated Large Language Model (LLM) family designed for safe, helpful, and honest AI interaction. It stands out for its strong performance in complex reasoning, creativity, coding, and its exceptionally large context window.

pricing.model: Hybrid: Pay-per-use API (token-based, model-dependent) and Subscription web interface (Claude Pro)
pricing.free_tier: Limited usage on claude.ai web interface

paid_tiers.name: Claude Pro
paid_tiers.description: Monthly subscription for priority access, higher usage limits, early feature access on claude.ai

paid_tiers.name: API
paid_tiers.description: Pay-per-use based on input/output tokens for Haiku, Sonnet, Opus models

pricing.notes: API costs vary significantly by model.

use_cases.title: Summarizing Long Research Papers
use_cases.description: Leverage Claude's large context window to quickly summarize key findings from lengthy academic documents, making research more accessible.
use_cases.example: Prompt: 'Please provide a concise summary of the key contributions in this 50-page research paper on quantum computing.'

use_cases.title: Customer Support Automation
use_cases.description: Deploy Claude to handle customer queries by automating responses, reducing wait times and enhancing support efficiency.
use_cases.example: Prompt: 'Respond to a customer complaint about a delayed shipment with empathy and provide actionable steps.'

use_cases.title: Content Generation for Marketing
use_cases.description: Utilize Claude to create engaging blog posts, social media updates, or ad copy based on provided guidelines and tone.
use_cases.example: Prompt: 'Generate a creative social media post for a new product launch in a friendly and professional tone.'

pros: Strong commitment to AI safety and ethics
Excellent reasoning, coding, and creative writing skills
cons: Opus API costs can be high
Web interface features might lag API

performance_metrics.Haiku: Optimized for lower latency and real-time interactions with moderate throughput and accuracy suitable for conversational tasks.
performance_metrics.Sonnet: Balances higher accuracy with moderate latency, ideal for detailed text analysis and complex queries.
performance_metrics.Opus: Delivers the highest accuracy with robust contextual understanding, though with higher latency and lower throughput compared to other variants.

sources.name: G2
highlights: Users praise its contextual understanding and creative outputs, though some note occasional latency issues.

sources.name: TrustRadius
highlights: Commended for its nuanced responses and robust performance in enterprise applications.

security_compliance.data_protection: API data not used for training by default. Emphasizes data privacy.
